name: Trafiri
description: The project focuses on creating a website for tourists to discover Kenya's hidden gems using HTML, CSS, PHP, a MYSQL database and other tools.

name: Siwaka Pharmacy
description: The project focuses on creating a pharmacy management system with a graphical user interface (GUI) using Swing and JDBC for database connectivity.

name: BookFinder
description: The project focuses on creating a book recommendation system as a website using generative AI to recommend users book based on their prompt.

name: Japanese Project
description: The project focuses on creating a Japanese Vocabulary Guessing Game as a CLI using Python to help Japanese students learn Japanese vocabulary.
